title: 2.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
What are the different means of transport?
Have you used all of the above? Which one is your favorite?Show your favorite mode of transport (air, water or land) on a suitable background. Make a character travel in the car, airplane, ship or any other means of transport you choose to display.
